SummaryEnglish: The Adventures of Sinbad is a re-telling of the adventures of the famous character from The Arabian Nights. Sinbad, along with his elder brother, Doubar, and the crew of his ship, the Nomad, sets sail from Baghdad in search of adventure and riches. Along the way the voyagers encounter strange tribes, evil wizards and giant sea monsters intent on destroying them.

1.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad returns to Bagdad after two long years at sea. He discovers that things are not as he left them. The city is now in the hands of an incompetent Prince and his devious grand vizier.

2.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad sets out with a new crew to save a kidnapped princess from and evil sorcerer and his daughter. Along the way, Sinbad and his crew battle a raging sea monster and a traitor.

3.SummaryEnglish: A sorceress captures Sinbad, who refuses her love, then he must fight to the death the man-beast Goz.

4.SummaryEnglish: The crew runs aground on a mysterious island, where a sculptor, Vincenzo, wants to immortalize Maeve in marble.

5.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad is chosen to champion the island kingdom of Baronia. He must battle several adversaries, including a reluctant Samurai.

6.SummaryEnglish: After the Nomad suffers damage in a storm the crew is forced to stop in the City of Mists. Sindbad wins the 'Jewel of the City' in a card game, only to discover that the 'Jewel' is Serendib, a 15 year old girl with magical powers.

7.SummaryEnglish: Firouz builds a new invention he calls the Ruby Beamer. When the crew goes ashore to apologize for damage it caused, Firouz is acclaimed as the people's savior.

8.SummaryEnglish: While out for a walk, Maeve is kidnaapped by norseman who believe she has ben sent by the god Thor as a sacrifice to the Gulien Demon.

9.SummaryEnglish: The crew is after and Egyptian obelisk that gives power to whoever possesses it. Rumina disguises herself as Sinbad in order to start a war.

10.SummaryEnglish: Rongar is sold to the Dark Lord Scrath. They are given the opportunity to rescue him by completeing a task set for them. Sinbad and his crew race to find skulls that represent the four elements.

11.SummaryEnglish: A prince enlists Sinbad to help him rid haunted Arborea of an evil usurper.

12.SummaryEnglish: The monster Vorgon drains the life force from a village, then picks a man for its host; now it wants Sinbad.

13.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and his crew are challenged by Carpet-riding thieves in Mirhago.

14.SummaryEnglish: When the necklace that protects Princess Gaia of Leopold is stolen by Vatex, the crew, with the help of Suraya, try to get it back.

15.SummaryEnglish: A rich merchant asks Sinbad to help rescue his missing wife.

16.SummaryEnglish: Talia, pirate acquaintance from Sinbad's past, is attempting to rescue a sacred stone from of a cult that is worshipping it. Maeve is suspisious of Talia's motives.

17.SummaryEnglish: The crew battle a cyclopse as well as a demon from Sinbad's past.

18.SummaryEnglish: A young woman asks Sinbad for help getting back to her home. When they get there, they discover that he father has turned himself into a giant.

19.SummaryEnglish: Rumina follows the crew to the Old One's Island where they all become trapped. In order to escape, they must work together against the Trickster who is using their fears against them.

20.SummaryEnglish: Three cursed sailors come aboard the Nomad. Sinbad and his crew are held hostage by a madman seeking Poseidon's trident.

21.SummaryEnglish: The of the Nomad journey to the Isle of Bliss in order to find the singing sword so that they can use it to get Master Dim Dim back. Things go horribly wrong when they encounter a giant snake and the crew must fight for the life of Doubar.

22.SummaryEnglish: Scratch and Rumina join forces to raise her father, Turock, from the dead. In return for his help, Rumina agrees to help Scratch steal the souls of Sinbad and the Nomad's crew.

1.SummaryEnglish: Maeve is lost in a sea storm and Sinbad becomes separated from the crew as he searches for her. On a small island Sinbad meets Bryn, a woman with no memory of her past and a rainbow bracelet, like his, and no memory.

2.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and Tetsu the Ronin join forces to defeat seven mystical demons that are kidnapping women from an isolated village.

3.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and his crew are imprisoned by the beautiful vampire, Kalilah. She will spare the crew if Sinbad can retrieve her heart which was taken from her by the black magic of her vampire husband, Baron Orlock. Sinbad and Rongar seek the heart with Orlock's deadly assistant, Marissa, in pursuit.

4.SummaryEnglish: As the son of an evil warlord and a witch, Young Timur has more problems than your average young man. His dead father's demonic spirit is looking for a new home and his son's body seems more than adequate. Sinbad and crew must journey to Hell to save Young Timur from his father and eternal damnation.

5.SummaryEnglish: Returning to his homeland, Rongar confronts the man who robbed him of his birthright and is reunited with his sister, the seer Zorah, who had betrayed him years before.

6.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and crew meet up with old friends and an old enemy at a wedding feast. The victum of a past injustice, Bakbuk the tinker sends his army of killer dolls to seek revenge.

7.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and crew come to the aid of villagers whose firstborn sons are being enslaved by the three gorgon sisters: Eurayle, Stheno and Medusa, to work in their jasper mine.

8.SummaryEnglish: A werewolf's bite passes the curse to Doubar and Sinbad must kill his brother to save Bryn from a gruesome death.

9.SummaryEnglish: A gentle giant, Uruk, is helped by Sinbad and friends to break free from the evil wizard Kumar.

10.SummaryEnglish: Evil accompanies two passengers taking a woman's body to an island burial.

11.SummaryEnglish: Alien travelers crash land their spaceship near a small village. Sinbad witnesses the crash from sea and sails to the village to offer his help. Meanwhile, the local village priest scares the village people into believing that the travelers are demons and Sinbad was sent by them to capture the people of the village.

12.SummaryEnglish: Marauding Druids are after an ancient, magical Wiccan book.

13.SummaryEnglish: Death riders imprison suspected plague victims, including Sinbad and crew.

14.SummaryEnglish: A mystical empress believes Sinbad is her reincarnated lover.

15.SummaryEnglish: A prince's gala features the public execution of pirates, among them, Sinbad.

16.SummaryEnglish: To his grief, a game hunter captures a baby gryphon for his side show.

17.SummaryEnglish: A teen who controls an invisible beast holds Sinbad and the crew captive.

18.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad escorts a beautiful prisoner to trial for murder, but someone does not want her to get there.

19.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad faces the Minotaur to restore an island to its rightful rule.

20.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and crew come to the aid of a village being attacked by the mysterious stalkers that are controlled by the mad scientist Naaupo.

21.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and crew are entrusted with the care of an infant with magical ties to an order of warrior monks.

22.SummaryEnglish: Sinbad's soul hangs in the balance as Scratch and a woman from his past battle to draw him to either the darkness or the light.
